content.text: Match ends, Espanyol 1, Barcelona 0.
Second Half ends, Espanyol 1, Barcelona 0.
Attempt missed. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the right is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.
Foul by Dídac Vilá (Espanyol).
Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card.
David López (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card.
Goal!  Espanyol 1, Barcelona 0. Óscar Melendo (Espanyol) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Marc Navarro.
Víctor Sánchez (Espanyol) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Rafinha (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Víctor Sánchez (Espanyol).
Thomas Vermaelen (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card.
Corner,  Espanyol. Conceded by Jasper Cillessen.
Attempt saved. Marc Navarro (Espanyol) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner.
Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona).
Gerard Moreno (Espanyol) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Jasper Cillessen (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by David López (Espanyol).
Attempt saved. Marc Navarro (Espanyol) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.
Attempt blocked. Óscar Duarte (Espanyol) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Esteban Granero with a cross.
Corner,  Espanyol. Conceded by Thomas Vermaelen.
Offside, Barcelona. Aleix Vidal tries a through ball, but Lionel Messi is caught offside.
Substitution, Barcelona. Rafinha replaces Denis Suárez.
Attempt missed. Leo Baptistao (Espanyol) left footed shot from outside the box is too high following a corner.
Corner,  Espanyol. Conceded by Gerard Piqué.
Substitution, Espanyol. Óscar Melendo replaces Javi Fuego because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

Offside, Espanyol. Víctor Sánchez tries a through ball, but Gerard Moreno is caught offside.

Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Diego López.
